entities.description: Indicates whether the respondent misused sedatives in the past year.
The month in which the respondent first misused sedatives in the past year.
Indicates whether the respondent used a sedative not directed by a doctor in the past 30 days.
Number of days the respondent used a sedative not directed by a doctor in the past 30 days.
Respondent's estimate of the number of days they used a sedative not directed by a doctor in the past 30 days.
